avg_abs_motion: mean of absolute (w.r.t first volume) volume-to-volume movement - from eddy_movement_rms
avg_rel_motion: mean of relative (w.r.t previous volume) volume-to-volume movement - from eddy_movement_rms
avg_x_translation: mean of participant movement - from eddy_parameters
avg_y_translation: mean of participant movement - from eddy_parameters
avg_z_translation: mean of participant movement - from eddy_parameters
avg_x_rotation: mean of participant movement (converted to degrees) - from eddy_parameters
avg_y_rotation: mean of participant movement (converted to degrees) - from eddy_parameters
avg_z_rotation: mean of participant movement (converted to degrees) - from eddy_parameters
TotalOutliers: count of outlier slices - from eddy_outlier_report
TotalOutliers_pc: count of outlier slices as a percentage of total slices (80 non-b0 volumes * 68 slices
